content:
From the Angonoka tortoise to Attenborough’s echidna, many species across the globe are facing the threat of extinction. This brilliantly interactive infographic counts down the 100 most endangered, allowing you to filter results according to species type and see where on Earth they remain, clinging on to their existence. There’s also information on each species, including population size, primary threats and the action required to save them. Grimly fascinating stuff.
The infographic is produced by BestCollegesOnline.org. 
.
title: 100 Most Endangered Species in the World
author: Karl Fabricius
